name: Capitan Sevilla
storyline:
Mariano López, a sausage transporter, suffers the effects of a nuclear explosion. Unconscious, he is lying on the road next to his sausages and the remains of the truck, which are scattered throughout the area of ​​the accident. Hours later he wakes up hungry, and ingests one of his radiation-affected sausages. 
 
But what the heck is happening !? Mariano is transforming: all his muscles are growing; their stature increases; his vulgar face becomes that of a handsome superhero ready to fight the evil professor TORREBRUNO.
summary:
Side scroller beat em up/shooter developed in the late 80's by Hi-Score and published by Dinamic Software. 
 
The game consists of two parts. To play the second, you will have to complete the first and thus obtain the access code.
